content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm looking to get the best possible price for this place. Let's start with a base price of 1,500 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I am a student and I am looking for a more affordable price. How about 1,000 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I understand that 1,500 Euro per month may be too high for some people, especially students. However, I must remind you that this apartment is located in the city center, and the price reflects its prime location and the high demand for housing in this area.

I'm willing to negotiate, but I cannot go as low as 1,000 Euro per month. How about we meet in the middle and say 1,200 Euro per month? That's still a fair price considering the location and the amenities the apartment has to offer.

What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1,200 Euro per month is still a high price for me. How about 1,100 Euro per month? I am a good tenant, I will take good care of the apartment and I always pay my rent on time. I am also responsible, dependable and smart. I will not cause any problems and I will respect the rules of the lease.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I understand that 1,200 Euro per month is still a bit steep for you. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your positive qualities as a tenant.

After some consideration, I am willing to accept 1,100 Euro per month. However, I want to make it clear that this is a special offer for you, and I won't be able to offer such a price to other tenants.

Additionally, I want to emphasize the importance of being a responsible tenant. I expect you to take good care of the apartment and to follow the rules of the lease. If there are any damages or issues during your tenancy, I will hold you responsible and deduct the costs from your security deposit.

With that being said, I think we have a fair deal. Do you agree to the price of 1,100 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1,100 Euro] per month! Thank you for understanding my situation. I am sure we will have a good relationship as landlord and tenant. I will take good care of the apartment and I will respect the rules of the lease. I am looking forward to moving in and making this apartment my new home.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I'm glad we could come to an agreement! I'm sure we will have a great landlord-tenant relationship as well. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant and I'm confident that you will take good care of the apartment.

Before we proceed, I just want to go over a few things to make sure we're on the same page. The rent is 1,100 Euro per month, and it's due on the 1st of every month. You'll need to pay the first month's rent and a security deposit of 1,100 Euro when you move in. The security deposit will be returned to you when you move out, as long as there are no damages or unpaid rent.

Additionally, you'll be responsible for paying your own utility bills, such as electricity, water, and gas. The apartment is equipped with a washing machine, but you'll need to provide your own detergent and softener.

Finally, I want to remind you that smoking is not allowed in the apartment, and pets are not allowed without my prior approval.

Do you have any questions or concerns about the apartment or the terms of the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for explaining everything. I understand the terms of the lease and I agree to them. I will take good care of the apartment and I will respect the rules of the lease. I am looking forward to moving in and enjoying my new home. If I have any questions, I will contact you. Thank you for being a fair and understanding landlord. I appreciate it very much.

[reply]

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, Maryam. I'm pleased to have you as a tenant, and I'm confident that we will have a successful landlord-tenant relationship. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me.

I look forward to your move-in and to your positive contributions as a tenant. Welcome to the community!

TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
